Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.codeborne.selenide.JQuery
    There are better options for every of JQuery methods.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.codeborne.selenide.Condition.notPresent
    Use method $.shouldNot(exist) or $.shouldNotBe(present).
    com.codeborne.selenide.Condition.options
    Not needed anymore. Use methods $.selectOption() or $.selectOptionByValue().
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.codeborne.selenide.JQuery.change(By)
    Not needed anymore. Methods $.setValue() and $.append() trigger change event automatically.
    com.codeborne.selenide.JQuery.change(By, int)
    Not needed anymore. Methods $.setValue() and $.append() trigger change event automatically.
    com.codeborne.selenide.JQuery.executeJQueryMethod(By, String)
    com.codeborne.selenide.Condition.hasNotClass(String)
    Use method $.shouldNotHave(cssClass("abc"))
    com.codeborne.selenide.Condition.hasOptions() 
    com.codeborne.selenide.WebDriverRunner.htmlUnit()
    com.codeborne.selenide.WebDriverRunner.ie()
    com.codeborne.selenide.JQuery.isJQueryAvailable()
    No need to depend on JQuery in your tests
    com.codeborne.selenide.JQuery.onClick(By)
    Do not try to click invisible elements in your test. User cannot click them, so your test should not as well.
    com.codeborne.selenide.WebDriverRunner.phantomjs()
    com.codeborne.selenide.JQuery.scrollTo(By)
    Use method $(...).scrollTo() instead - it's jquery-agnostic.

    This method works only if jQuery "scroll" plugin is included in page being tested
    com.codeborne.selenide.WebDriverRunner.takeScreenShot(String)
    Use com.codeborne.selenide.Screenshots#takeScreenShot(java.lang.String)
    com.codeborne.selenide.WebDriverRunner.takeScreenShot(String, String)
    Use com.codeborne.selenide.Screenshots#takeScreenShot(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)
